Zack Littell shut down Cleveland for six innings.
Jonathan Aranda homered for the Rays.
Tanner Bibee gave up a two-run homer in the third and a solo shot in the fourth inning.
Zack Littell tossed six scoreless innings without issuing a walk.
Bibee ended his day having given up three runs in six innings with no walks and nine strikeouts.
Jose Siri narrowly missed a homer with a blast to center field that hit the yellow line marking the top of the wall.
Jhonkensy Noel and David Fry hit back-to-back doubles in the eighth inning.
Edwin Uceta worked a 1-2-3 ninth for his third save.
David Fry had a pinch-hit RBI double in the eighth inning.
Steven Kwan was scratched from the lineup due to back soreness.
